warnings.tempcold: Low temperature level detected. Stay indoors and keep warm.
warnings.temphot: High temperature level detected. Stay hydrated and avoid prolonged outdoor activities.
warnings.humidity: High humidity level detected. Consider staying indoors.
warnings.wind_speed: Strong winds expected. Secure outdoor objects and avoid high areas.
warnings.uv_index: High UV levels detected. Wear protective clothing.

aqi_warnings.good: Air quality is good. You can enjoy outdoor activities.
aqi_warnings.moderate: Air quality is acceptable; however, some pollutants may slightly affect unusually sensitive people.
aqi_warnings.slightly_unhealthy: Air quality is slightly unhealthy. People with respiratory issues should limit outdoor activities.
aqi_warnings.unhealthy: Air quality is unhealthy. Consider limiting outdoor activities, especially those with health problem.
aqi_warnings.very_unhealthy: Air quality is very unhealthy. Avoid outdoor activities if possible.
aqi_warnings.hazardous: Air quality is hazardous. Stay indoors and avoid all outdoor physical activities.

commands.weather: Get current weather for the specified city, with details on temperature, humidity, wind speed, UV index, rain levels, and air quality. Usage: !weather [city]
commands.forecast: Provides a 3-hour interval forecast or a 6-day forecast for the specified city, displaying temperature, humidity, and conditions. Usage: !forecast [city]
commands.hurricane: Retrieve information about a specific tropical cyclone in North Atlantic, including storm duration, category, ACE, max wind speed, and track visualization. Usage: !hurricane [Storm Name] [Year]. NOTE: Data is PRE-2024
commands.city: Show custom cities that can be used with !weather
